background_context.situation: Involved in a community organization with a focus on improving the website and user experience.
background_context.environment: Working within a club setting with an outdated system (Wild Apricot) and limited control over the application.
background_context.constraints: Limited ability to customize the application and reliance on outdated technology.

goals_motivations.drives: Desire to modernize the club's online presence and improve user experience.
achievements: Enable users to update their own information easily.

behaviors_patterns.current_work: Regularly engages with the website for testing and feedback purposes.
behaviors_patterns.habits: Uses the website instead of the application for managing events and memberships.

obstacles: Old-fashioned and convoluted membership join workflow.
Website navigation issues—hidden buttons and convoluted UI.
pain_points_frustrations.does_not_work_well: The application is restrictive and doesn't allow for much customization.

needs_desires.life_better: A streamlined way for users to manage their information and events.
needs_desires.looking_for: A modernized website experience that is user-friendly.

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Believes in the importance of a contemporary image for the club and user autonomy.
attitudes_beliefs.preferences: Values clear communication and ease of use in technology.

technical_comfort.technical_abilities: Comfortable with moderate technology but frustrated with outdated systems.
technical_comfort.learning_preferences: Prefers intuitive, user-friendly interfaces over complex systems.

quotes: I have this love-hate relationship with Wild Apricot.
I don’t want to be a member of an old person’s club.
I feel very, very lucky when I find that button to join.
